name: Survival Waves Pre Alpha 0.1
description:
Survival Waves is a game where you fight, build, and survive your way through waves of enemies and bosses.

Controls

aswd and Mouse to move around. Esc to exit and E to open shop. 1,2,3 to change attacks.

Note: Most features are not in the game and will be added in the future. This is also a pre alpha version and expect some bugs and issues.

Thanks for Reading
